{"id":449305701,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 4 months","timestamp":1611912730,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/449305701/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Happy Number","memory":"6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isHappy(int n) {\n        vector<int> arr;\n        int sum;\n        sum=n;\n        while(sum>=10){\n            arr.clear();\n            for(;sum!=0;){\n                arr.emplace_back(sum%10);\n                sum/=10;\n            }\n            sum=0;\n            for(int i=0;i<arr.size();i++){\n                sum+=arr[i]*arr[i];\n            }\n        }\n        if(sum==1 || sum==7) return true;\n        else return false;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"happy-number"}
